title: A cautious approach to holiday hiring
itunes:title: A cautious approach to holiday hiring
itunes:author: Marketplace / Kai Ryssdal
description: Around this time of year, companies begin hiring seasonal workers. Yet some large companies are planning on fewer hires. Despite a tight labor market, companies are uncertain whether consumer spending will remain strong through the holidays and are anxious about a recession. Plus, the Bank of Japan tries to prop up the yen, school districts call for cybersecurity funding and U.S. oil reserves reach a four-decade low.
